snippet: Mike Machado, a Democratic Assemblyman, today easily defeated a Republican attempt to recall him from office because he voted for a fellow Democrat, Willie Brown, for Assembly Speaker.   Early returns from absentee ballots -- traditionally more co...
lead_paragraph: Mike Machado, a Democratic Assemblyman, today easily defeated a Republican attempt to recall him from office because he voted for a fellow Democrat, Willie Brown, for Assembly Speaker. Early returns from absentee ballots -- traditionally more conservative than the precinct vote -- reported Mr. Machado defeating the recall by a 2-to-1 ratio, 8,639 to recall him to 17,114 opposed.

headline.main: Effort to Recall California Lawmaker Fails
